pr_title: Remove non-semantic changes prior to using a sequenced threadpool in …

timeline.message: Remove non-semantic changes prior to using a sequenced threadpool in mbus.

timeline.bodyText: If we'll be using this to signal sequencing, should it also be explicitly added to StorageReply? Both commands and replies need sequencing for storage API stuff
timeline.author: vekterli

replies.bodyText: Yes, probably. I will try and see what it is used for currently first.
replies.author: baldersheim
